Namespace EasyXLS.Drawings.Formatting

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlignmentFormat
    This class stores the text alignment for drawing objects.
    FillFormat
    This class stores the fill options for images, shapes and other drawing objects.
    FontFormat
    This class stores the font options for shapes and other drawing objects.
    Format3D
    This class stores the 3D-formatting for drawing objects.
    GradientStop
    This class stores the position, the color and the transparency of a stop for the gradient fill.
    LineColorFormat
    This class stores the line color options for images, shapes and other drawing objects.
    LineStyleFormat
    This class stores the line style options for images, shapes and other drawing objects.
    Rotation3D
    This class stores the 3D-rotation for drawing objects.
    ShadowFormat
    This class stores the shadow options for images, shapes and other drawing objects.
